content:
# Factory Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler (position x=-5.0, y=2.5) fueled with coal
- Steam engine (position x=0.5, y=6.5)
- Pipe network connecting water and steam
- Small electric pole (position x=0.5, y=8.5) connected to steam engine
- Central power pole (position x=0.5, y=10.5)

### Coal Mining Operation at position (16.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x=16.0, y=0.0) with 8 coal as fuel
- Wooden chest (position x=16.5, y=1.5) for coal collection (currently contains 226 coal)

### Iron Mining and Smelting at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position x=15.5, y=70.5)
- Stone furnace (position x=16.0, y=73.0) with 3 coal as fuel
- Inserter (position x=16.5, y=74.5) to move iron plates from furnace to chest
- Wooden chest (position x=16.5, y=75.5) for iron plate storage (currently contains 132 iron plates)
- Inserter (position x=17.5, y=75.5) to move iron plates from chest to belt
- Transport belt system starting at position x=18.5, y=75.5
- Small electric poles connecting to power network

### Iron Plate Transport System
Consists of:
- Belt group from iron chest area (starting at x=18.5, y=75.5) with 9 iron plates currently on it
- Multiple belt segments connecting across the map
- Belt path from (10.5, 75.5) to (2.5, 75.5)
- Additional belt path going north from (2.5, 75.5) to (2.5, 70.5)
- East-west belt path at y=70.5 from (2.5, 70.5) to (-5.5, 70.5)
- Underground belt path from iron chest area to circuit assembler area
- Intermediate chest for iron plates at position x=-33.5, y=75.5
- Inserter at position x=-34.5, y=74.5 to move iron plates from belt to chest
- Inserter at position x=-33.5, y=76.5 to move iron plates from chest to belt
- Belt path leading to circuit assembler at position x=-33.5, y=82.5
- Iron inserter at position x=-32.5, y=82.5 to feed iron plates to circuit assembler
- Small electric pole at position x=-32.5, y=79.5 to power iron inserter

### Copper Mining and Smelting at position (-46.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position x=-46.5, y=70.5)
- Stone furnace (position x=-46.0, y=73.0) with 6 coal as fuel
- Inserter (position x=-45.5, y=74.5) to move copper plates from furnace to chest
- Wooden chest (position x=-45.5, y=75.5) for copper plate storage
- Inserter (position x=-44.5, y=76.5) to move copper plates from chest to belt
- Transport belt system starting at position x=-44.5, y=75.5
- Small electric poles connecting to power network

### Copper Cable Production at position (-39.5, 80.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 2 (position x=-39.5, y=80.5) set to produce copper cable
- Inserter (position x=-41.5, y=80.5) to feed copper plates into assembler
- Wooden chest (position x=-42.5, y=80.5) for intermediate copper plate storage
- Inserter (position x=-43.5, y=80.5) to move copper plates from belt to chest
- Inser
